paper_abstract: This paper presents a new non-overlapping domain decomposition method for the Helmholtz equation, whose effective convergence is quasi-optimal. These improved properties result from a combination of an appropriate choice of transmission conditions and a suitable approximation of the Dirichlet to Neumann operator. A convergence theorem of the algorithm is established and numerical results validating the new approach are presented in both two and three dimensions. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A quasi-optimal non-overlapping domain decomposition algorithm for the Helmholtz equation
